metadata.title: The World Progresses, the Heroes Are Revealed

tracks.text: Silhouettes of Towa, Kei, Rakuro and Rei stand in front of portraits of their SLF characters Pencilgon, Oikatzo, Sunraku, and Psyger-0.
Text, Original Work, Katarina, Ryosuke Fuji. Serialized by Kodansha in Weekly Shounen Magazine
Rakuro wears a VR headset. The ID Shard, a diamond shaped pendant, swings in darkness.
Thirdrema, a western style town, stands at the foot of a hill with a castle at the top.
The sun sets and day turns to night.
Text, Shangri-La Frontier
Rakuro turns into Sunraku, who wields twin marsh daggers
Red water gurgles
Pencilgon descends to the ground and strikes with a spear
Katzo draws a red fist and black fist together, and her fists burst crimson.
Emul, Elke, Vash, Bilac, and Peitz walk along the Rabbituza palace verandah.
Psyger-0 and Psyger-100 stand back to back in a board room
Setsuna walks. Beyond her is the gnarled tree, high cliffs, and full moon.
Wethermon, a metal samurai, stares at us with glowing eyes. Fire licks his arms, shoulders, and stomach.
Kirin, a metal horse, rears in front of a red moon
A golden Reward Scales shift
Sunraku holds a two handed long sword and strikes at shadowy ghouls that surround him in a misty, purple forest.
Dozens of shadowy figures stand on outcroppings. Their eyes glow red.
Pencilgon swings a spear in mist
A headless horse and horseman gallop. She strikes
Katzo does a flying back flip over skeletal monsters
Wethermon draws a sword. The moon reflects in a muddy puddle. A drop splashes. Psyger-0 holds a sword, her long red plume blowing in the wind.
In a library, a girl with long pink braids and wide, green eyes smiles widely and reaches out a hand.
The Rebirth Tearjewel lands on Sunraku's abs and glows
Sunraku grips a moon blade. Wearing a beetle helmet and diamond shaped pendant, he runs forward. Katzo with red fists and Pencilgon with a spear run with him.
In slow motion, they approach the samurai. The world turns red.
He looks at the trio
A sakura blossom rests in his hand. He slowly closes his fingers.
He looks up
Text, 19, The World Progresses, the Heroes are Revealed
Wethermon takes a step away
He picks up his sword. Sunraku holds his blade.
Wethermon takes a step forward
The crumbling chips of metal mix with the following sakura blossoms.
Wethermon walks past Sunraku
Sunraku breathes and turns
Katzo and Pencilgon step back as Wethermon approaches the grave
He places his sword on the ground.
The remaining armor crumbles
His head and body drift away
leaving only the sword, standing next to the grave stone.
Unique Scenario EX, From the Living World, With Love, in progress
Blossoms disappear in chunks from the tree.
The red spider lilies appear in the barren earth.
The photo negative sky gives way to a clear sky with a full, shining moon.
The sword crumbles to dust. Setsuna's ghost reaches out a hand.
She smiles
The black haired man stares at the grave stone.
Black haired man is replaced by Wethermon. Setsuna covers her face.
She sparkles and fades
Setsuna disintegrates into glowing dust that rises to the moon.
The trio look up at the moon from the red spider lily field.
Text, Setsuna's remnant has kept they promise of bygone days. Wethermon the Tombguard has found eternal rest.
Dialog, Unique Scenario cleared
A bell rings above them. Label, Announce
At Utopia headquarters, a sky scraper in an urban area.
Server racks glitter
A computer screen in a glowing office
Shangri-La Frontier, World Story, Progress: 11%
An elaborate, 4 story stone building with the emblem of a quill writing in a book. Label, Royal Library, 2nd Collection
Text, Clan: "The Library", SLF game lore specialist clan.
Schwarz Vulf board room, 7 people
Label, Psyger-100, Schwarz Vulf leader
Psyger-100 looks at Sunraku's picture
Forest Grotto
The trio exit
A magic circle appears between them.
Psyger-0
Orcelott, Kechum, Branch, Lass, and Remy attack at once.
They lie on the ground. Text, 50 seconds later
Pencilgon throws a purple dagger in Orcelott's back
He disappears
Psyger-0 turns to Sunraku, who raises an eyebrow
She turns back to Pencilgon
She equips a large purple sword. Text, Satan, Emperor of Evil
Her armor turns black
Mushrom mic
His eyes are bloodshot
Psyger swings, Pencilgon dodges, leaps behind, swings, Psyger's arm blocks.
Miasma runs from Psyger's armor, up Pencilgon's arm. Psyger swings
Pencilgon's severed arm falls
She grabs her severed arm, still clenching the sword, and swings.
Psyger swings a sword. A dome of inky black lightning surrounds them, grows, and fades to brilliant light.
Text, 24, News: It's Morning, Indeed!
Text, Horror! Undulating White Cloth Ghost!!
Paetz
Text, The Rabituza famed Vorpal Carrot Bumper Crop
